welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lambton Shores, Canada! Get ready to experience the natural beauty and charm of our quaint town, known for its stunning beaches and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and embrace all that Lambton Shores has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Centralia Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Centralia Airport handles all freight and cargo services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sarnia Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sarnia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
